message.raw:
Long-needed commit with many bug fixes.
Improved tab file format for overlap/signal/aggregation plots
Added signal statistics heatmap plotting.
Added progress bar functionality
Addded unit testing framework
Removed overlap statistics plotting and GSC interface (commented out)
Added trackname translation ability to statistics plotting.
